Sharewave â€” New York, NY

Lead Front End Developer, Full Time, Salary + Equity

We're a team of 8 building a network that builds upon transactions happening in the private marketplace (from small startups to pre-ipo). I co-founded Sharewave with Josh Levine (former CTO of eTrade) and Robert "r0ml" Lefkowitz (long time technologist in financial services).

More about the position and our company here: https://sharewave.com/careers/
